title: Tudor portraits and Victorian footballers
itunes:title: Tudor portraits and Victorian footballers
itunes:subtitle: Tarnya Cooper introduces the National Portrait Gallery's new Elizabethan exhibition, while Richard Sanders delves into the early years of football. Plus, we talk to the BBC's Martin Davidson about the corporation's First World War plans
description:
Tarnya Cooper introduces the National Portrait Gallery's new Elizabethan exhibition, while Richard Sanders delves into the early years of football. Plus, we talk to the BBC's Martin Davidson about the corporation's First World War plans

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
